name: Weed Farm - Be a Ganja College
name_original: Weed Farm - Be a Ganja College
description:
You need to learn how to begin a weed business. Make the first step to start your weedfirm.
It's very simple and basic game play, easy as to smoke strains.
Correct allocate your fund and make money like a real narcos.
Plant, grow, and deal your product. Choose best leafly tea seed.
Just tap your base and earn more income. Use indica or hybrid growing grass.
Balance bud roots or replanted hemp pot. Smok party need cash and money.
Back to fallout college shelter and be the boss of the hempire war. Drug shop empire is grow.
Level up and reach a higher target. Protect your realm from gangster!
